message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  While $1,200,000 is a respectable figure, I believe the true value of this product warrants a higher investment.  Would you consider $1,350,000? This allows me to acknowledge your position while still reflecting the product's potential.

I appreciate your understanding of my position, but I still think $1,200,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Would you be willing to consider this price?
